title: DAZ3D - Bend Control for Genesis 3 Female(s)
description:
Bend Control is a system specially designed to improve the hip and leg bending results of Genesis 3 Female(s). The results are all driven by Bend Controller dials where you decide how much influence they have in relation to whatever pose your figure is in. Dial them in at any strength and see the difference!

You can also fine tune the results by adjusting the linked morphs to the Controllers, and they will remember those settings. Also included are a few manual driven morphs where you can adjust specific areas to your liking.

This product is compatible with all current character shapes and will be updated to support new ones if required.

Below is a promo video demonstrating what the product is about.

What's Included and Features

Bend Control for Genesis 3 Female(s) (.DUF)
Hip Control Dials
Hip Bend Controller
Hip Expand Left & Leg Bend
Hip Expand Left & Leg S2S
